channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: FTX customers are safe from being doxxed, for now
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The decision comes after a Jan. 8 filing by FTX’s lawyers, who argued that public disclosure could create an undue risk of identity theft or unlawful injury to FTX creditors.

item.title: El Salvador passes landmark crypto bill, paving way for Bitcoin-backed bonds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: The “Digital Asset Issuance” legislation will also create a regulatory body and establish a legal framework for all digital assets.

item.title: Bitcoin surges above $18K to cap 8-day winning streak
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The last time Bitcoin saw such a long streak of green candles was July 2021, during the height of the pandemic.

item.title: From Bernie Madoff to Bankman-Fried: Bitcoin maximalists have been validated
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Dr. Riste Simnjanovski & Kenneth Minesinger
item.description: The parallels between Sam Bankman-Fried and Bernie Madoff are ample. On the bright side, both men highlighted the fact that Bitcoin maximalists are immune to Ponzi schemes.

item.title: Ooki DAO misses lawsuit response deadline, default judgment on the cards
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The commodities regulator has begun the process of getting a court ruling on the Ooki DAO case after the latter failed to respond to the lawsuit by the deadline.

item.title: Miami-Dade gains right to remove FTX name from Heat arena
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: County officials agreed in 2021 to rename the Miami Heat’s arena “FTX Arena” until 2040, in return for $135 million from the now-bankrupt crypto exchange.

item.title: Ava Labs partners with AWS to offer one-click node deployment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: Other new features include a subnet deployment service and GovCloud integration for compliance-friendly Dapps

item.title: Silvergate hit with another class-action suit, this time for securities law violations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: According to allegations, the company and its executives knowingly misled investors with positive statements despite accusations involving money laundering and tanking share prices.

item.title: Price analysis 1/11: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, DOT, LTC, UNI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and altcoins are extending their rally and traders are hopeful that the gains will push higher after this week’s Consumer Price Index data is released.

item.title: Bitcoin miner Northern Data says production increased by 315% Y/Y in 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: According to Northern Data AG, it generated a total of 2,798 BTC in the fiscal year 2022.

item.title: China’s central bank includes digital yuan in report on currency circulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The 13.61 billion e-CNY represented roughly 0.13% of the 10.47 trillion yuan in circulation at the end of 2022.

item.title: Touch and smell comes to the metaverse, Nifty Newsletter, Jan 4–10
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A cybersecurity firm warned users of a fake Pokemon NFT game that spreads malware and targets gamers.

item.title: City of London, British trade groups form new digital currency advocacy alliance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The UK capital’s governing body is partnering with the Digital Pound Association and other trade groups to promote good crypto policy and practice and the UK’s position as a global financial center.

item.title: Bitcoin price rally to $18K possible as $275M in BTC options expire on Friday
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin bulls aim to push BTC price to $18,000, and options data outlines clear reasons why.

item.title: Huobi delists 33 tokens in one day, citing trading risk, low volume
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Some tokens were delisted due to “severe violation of regulations.”

item.title: A key change in Ethereum options pricing hints that ETH price could rise beyond $1,350
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ethereum whales and market makers are no longer charging excessive premiums for protective put options, a sign that ETH price could be en route to new highs.

item.title: Binance approved to offer crypto services to Swedish customers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The decision from Sweden’s financial authority followed regulators in France, Bahrain, Spain and Dubai granting similar approvals for Binance in 2022.

item.title: Three Arrows Capital creditors express frustration with bankruptcy process during call
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: 3AC co-founder Kyle Davies announced regular meetings with creditors, noting that all involved parties are welcome to attend.

item.title: Bitcoin gained 300% in year before last halving — Is 2023 different?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin has the potential to deliver gains that are stronger than “most think,” market analyst Rekt Capital believes.

item.title: Nigerian innovator launches first active Bitcoin Lightning node in the country
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: A new Bitcoin lightning node in Nigeria could inspire individuals to take “control of their financial future,” node runner Megasley told Cointelegraph.

item.title: Abu Dhabi-based Venom Foundation launches $1B fund for Web3 and blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Venom Ventures Fund is allocating $1 billion to invest in Web3, blockchain and cryptocurrency projects and services.

item.title: FTX has recovered over $5B in cash and liquid crypto: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Previous reports suggested that FTX saw losses peak at nearly $9 billion in total liabilities.

item.title: Multiparty computation could offer increased protection for crypto wallets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: Multiparty computation can help users to protect their private keys and seed phrases when used in wallets.

item.title: Solana price rally risks exhaustion after SOL’s 120% pump in 2 weeks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: SOL price has been unable to close above a key resistance level of around $17.50 despite its big rebound in the past two weeks.

item.title: Music NFTs are helping independent creators monetize and build a fanbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: The Agenda podcast chats with Adam Levy of Mint and rapper Jay Kila about nonfungible tokens, Web3 and the struggles of being an independent musician.

item.title: Dutch exchange Bitvavo rejects DCG’s proposal to repay 70% of debt
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: After having about $290 million locked at Digital Currency Group, Bitvavo decided to pre-fund the assets on its own and is now looking for full repayment.

item.title: Hong Kong watchdog aims to restrict retail traders to liquid products
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: When asked about Bitcoin or Ether, SFC executive Julia Leung Fung-yee did not respond but reiterated that “highly liquid” products will be allowed.

item.title: WazirX releases proof of reserves with majority of funds in Binance wallets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange released its proof of reserves and proclaimed it to be India’s largest exchange both in volume and reserve funds.

item.title: DCG chief Barry Silbert pens letter to shareholders, community reacts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Barry Silbert’s letter to shareholders came just hours after Cameron Winklevoss wrote an open letter accusing him of defrauding customers.

item.title: Coinbase to close majority of Japan operations following global layoffs: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Vice President of International and Business Development, Nana Murugesan, said that the firm decided to “wind down” the majority of its operations in Japan.
